snippet.title: The Spirit and the Mouse - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
After a shocking thunderstorm brings them together, unlikely allies Lila the mouse and Lumion the Spirit guardian must work in tandem to restore balance to their quaint village. Thankfully, Lila has her big heart and electrifying new powers to aid her on this journey.

Guide her through a heartwarming adventure across Sainte-et-Claire to befriend playful electric spirits called Kibblins and illuminate this village once more.

The Spirit and the Mouse is a narrative-focused adventure game that has you searching every nook and cranny of this world to complete objectives and collect items to aid you in your humble quest to assist those in need.

The Spirit and the Mouse (C) Alblune S.E.N.C
Also available on Nintendo Switch, PS4 and PS5.

#thespiritandthemouse #mouse #steam #steamgame #steamgames #wholesomegames #spiritandthemouse
